00222   const std::vector<std::string> &getHeaderValue(const std::string &key) { 
00223     std::map<std::string, std::vector<std::string> >::iterator iter;
00224     iter = m_Header.find(key);
00225     if(iter == m_Header.end())
00226       Err::errAbort("Don't recognize header key: " + key);

00228   }
